title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook pasta. Fry pancetta. Beat eggs with parmesan. Combine pasta, pancetta, and egg mixture. Serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Grill until cooked. Simmer tomato puree with cream and spices. Add chicken, stir, and serve hot.

title: Smokey Jollof
summary: Smokey Jollof is made with long-grain rice, tomatoes, chilis, onions, spices, and sometimes other vegetables and/or meat.
ingredients: 3 cups of Rice (The Golden Sella basmati rice is an absolute fav)
Half a cup of Chicken stock
Spices of your choice 1/2 tsp each (cayenne, paprika, white pepper and bay leaves)
instructions: Blend tomatoes, red bell peppers, onions, and scotch bonnet peppers into a smooth paste.
Heat oil in a pot, sauté sliced onions, and fry the blended mix until thickened and oil separates.
Add tomato paste, curry powder, thyme, bay leaves, bouillon cubes, and salt. Stir well.
Add washed rice, chicken stock, and water. Stir gently to combine.
Cover and cook on low heat until rice is soft and liquid is absorbed.
Fluff with a fork and serve hot with fried plantains or grilled chicken.

title: Spicy Noodles
summary: Mouthwatering Spicy Noodles that packed with flavor and easy to make.
instructions: Cook noodles according to package instructions, drain, and set aside.
Heat vegetable oil in a pan, sauté garlic and onions until fragrant.
Add chili paste, soy sauce, and sesame oil. Stir well.
Toss in the cooked noodles and mix until evenly coated.
Add sliced green chili and spring onions, stir for 1 minute.
Serve hot, optionally with a fried egg on top.
